{"id":1019750053,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1691894985,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1019750053/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Pair Sum in an Array","memory":"67.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int fxn(int n){\n        int mxm=0;\n        while(n){\n            int a=0;\n            a=n%10;\n            \n            n=n/10;\n            mxm=max(a,mxm);\n        }\n        return mxm;\n    }\n    int maxSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n         int cnt=-1;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-1;i++){\n            for(int j=i+1;j<nums.size();j++){\n                if(fxn(nums[i])==fxn(nums[j])){\n                    int c= nums[i]+nums[j];\n                    cnt=max(c,cnt);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return cnt;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-pair-sum-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
